headline.print_headline: Giants’ Victor Cruz Needs More Time to Heal
headline.main: Giants’ Victor Cruz Needs More Time to Heal

snippet: Cruz said doctors were prohibiting him from testing his injured left calf for several more days, and there is no timetable for his return to the lineup.
lead_paragraph: Cruz said doctors were prohibiting him from testing his injured left calf for several more days, and there is no timetable for his return to the lineup.
